title: Handle an Agent-to-Agent Referral
description: An agent receives a referral for a buyer moving to their city from an out-of-state agent. They must manage the referral agreement and client handoff.

tasks.description: Receive the referral and contact information for the new buyer client from the referring agent.
Generate a standard referral agreement form, specifying the referral fee percentage, and send it to the referring agent for signature.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates and sends the referral contract.

tasks.description: Make initial contact with the new buyer client to introduce themself and begin the onboarding process.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully connects with the referred client.
